headline.main: In China, Dreams of Vying for an Oscar

snippet: President Obama, emboldened by his use of executive powers to fight climate change at home, challenged China to make the same effort to reduce greenhouse-gas emissions.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, emboldened by his use of executive powers to fight climate change at home, challenged China to make the same effort to reduce greenhouse-gas emissions.

snippet: Chinese companies are selling law enforcement equipment that can be used for torture, fueling abuses in Africa and Asia, rights organizations reported Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Chinese companies are selling law enforcement equipment that can be used for torture, fueling abuses in Africa and Asia, rights organizations reported Tuesday.
abstract: Report by Amnesty International and Omega Research Foundation finds that more than 130 Chinese companies are exporting law enforcement equipment that can be used for torture; study finds that exports are fueling human rights abuses in Africa and Asia.
